did.unittitle: James J. Bambrick "The Building Service Story" Manuscript
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: "'Your Union Can't Live with Racketeers or Communists' as told in The Building Service Story," by James J. Bambrick.

bioghist.p: James J. Bambrick was founder and builder of Local 32-B.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a photocopy of "'Your Union Can't Live with Racketeers or Communists' as told in The Building Service Story," by James J. Bambrick.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: James J. Bambrick "The Building Service Story" Manuscript #6072m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
